title: 15 Nordstrom Fashion Bestsellers - With Deals You Don't Want to Miss
description: As shopping editors, we know all the best secrets for navigating Nordstrom's site to find standout styles (and even better deals). It's our job to uncover top-rated products, and Nordstrom certainly doesn't disappoint. Right now is a great time to score some of the brand's most popular pieces at prices you'll love - especially the ones on sale. If you find yourself in the market to update your closet with a new clothing item or even a top-rated pair of shoes, we have more than a few suggestions. We've curated products that are not only trending, but included in our own personal favorites as well, with many being highly discounted. Below, we've laid them all out for you - because, after all, what are shopping fairy godmothers for? Nordstrom recently released tons of new products under $50 to the sale section that are sure to sell out quickly, plus a few cult-favorite pieces that are hard enough to find in stock. From a top-rated swimsuit to stylish jeans and editor-loved sunglasses, these pieces are designed to live in your closet for the longterm - even as they endure multiple trend changes and TikTok aesthetics. Check out the best Nordstrom clothes and accessories that customers are currently loving from the retailer ahead, and buy them before they're gone.
author: Kyley Warren
excerpt: Here's what's trending at Nordstrom this season.
text: While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.As shopping editors, we know all the best secrets for navigating Nordstrom's site to find standout styles (and even better deals). It's our job to uncover top-rated products, and Nordstrom certainly doesn't disappoint. Right now is a great time to score some of the brand's most popular pieces at prices you'll love — especially the ones on sale. If you find yourself in the market to update your closet with a new clothing item or even a top-rated pair of shoes, we have more than a few suggestions. We've curated products that are not only trending, but included in our own personal favorites as well, with many being highly discounted. Below, we've laid them all out for you — because, after all, what are shopping fairy godmothers for? Nordstrom recently released tons of new products under $50 to the sale section that are sure to sell out quickly, plus a few cult-favorite pieces that are hard enough to find in stock. From a top-rated swimsuit to stylish jeans and editor-loved sunglasses, these pieces are designed to live in your closet for the longterm — even as they endure multiple trend changes and TikTok aesthetics. Check out the best Nordstrom clothes and accessories that customers are currently loving from the retailer ahead, and buy them before they're gone.PS Photography | Angela EliasBest SunglassesAire Whirlpool 57mm Aviator Sunglasses ($12, originally $40) If you've been searching for the perfect pair of vintage-inspired aviator sunglasses, the search is over — at least according to our editor, that is. She tested out this tortoiseshell pair and rated it five stars for its shape, soft lens tint, and subtle pattern. Read more about why she loves these sunglasses in this Aire Whirlpool 53mm Aviator Sunglasses review. Editor Quote: "I've tried on pairs of aviator sunglasses under $20 that definitely looked their price — I blame the high-gloss shine of the plastic, the thin frames, and the all-wrong lens shapes — but these look much more expensive than they are. When people compliment them, I'm almost giddy to share the price. At less than $40, I honestly consider them a steal." — Angela Elias, contributing editor, Shoppingnordstrom.comBest Denim Cutoff ShortsBP. '90s High Waist Cutoff Denim Shorts ($30, originally $50) Every summer capsule wardrobe needs a solid pair of raw-hem denim shorts, and this vintage-inspired option from BP. is the gold standard. Made from premium, non-stretch denim with a high waist and relaxed fit, it's a classic piece you'll reach for all season.nordstrom.comBest Workout LeggingsZella Live In High Waist Leggings ($33, originally $59) Ready to jump back on the fitness bandwagon? You'll feel even more empowered to kickstart your athletic goals with the help of a great pair of leggings — just like these best-selling Zella leggings from Nordstrom. The high, slip-proof waistband includes a pocket. Whether you're going for a run or just running errands, these leggings will ensure you do it comfortably.nordstrom.comBest Tie-Front TopWAYF Tabitha Tie Front Woven Shirt ($39, originally $55) This tie-front top couldn't be more on trend or perfect for a hot summer day. Made from breezy cotton with just a hint of elastane, it's equally comfortable and cute. Pair it with linen shorts or mix and match with your favorite pair of denim.nordstrom.comBest Linen PantsCaslon Tapered Linen Pants ($42, originally $60) If you've been on the hunt for a pair of linen pants, you'll want to snag these immediately. Currently 30 percent off, they're a popular option that has the cutest tapered hem and an easy drawstring waist for extra comfort.nordstrom.comBest Deal on a Wire-Free BraWacoal Comfort First Wire Free T-Shirt Bra ($46, originally $68) Not only is this bra's wire-free construction incredibly comfortable, but it also looks fantastic under a T-shirt. It has brushed fabric that feels soft on the skin and foam-lined cups that help to shape and smooth. We love the pretty eggshell blue color, too.nordstrom.comBest Open-Knit Tank TopSanctuary Open Stitch Sleeveless Cotton Sweater ($50, originally $69) For an elevated tank top that you can dress up or down, this open-weave, sleeveless sweater is a perfect fit. Throw it over a nude cami and pair it with everything from trousers and skirts to jeans and shorts. It also comes in a vibrant shade of green if you're craving more color.nordstrom.comBest Tank DressStretch Cotton Ribbed Tank Dress ($56, originally $80) Comfortable and casual, this ribbed tank dress is being offered for an unbeatable price and ideal for days when you want to look polished without trying too hard. Slip into a pair of sandals and sling on a tote bag for a classic summer look.nordstrom.comBest Bathing SuitBeach Riot Reese Rib One-Piece Swimsuit ($67, originally $148) This Beach Riot one-piece swimsuit is giving '90s Baywatch in the best way with its minimal yet undeniably flattering cut and bold shade. If black isn't your color, it comes in five other hues. With a 4.2 rating, it's a solidly popular choice.nordstrom.comBest Deal on Wide-Leg JeansLevi's Baggy High Waist Wide Leg Dad Jeans ($70, originally $108) These wide-leg jeans are exactly what your wardrobe calls for. Made from premium non-stretch denim, they're as comfortable as sweats but offer much more polish. Pair them with everything from sneakers to flats.nordstrom.comBest SneakersVeja Impala Sneaker ($75, originally $150) If you're looking for a chic, sporty look, you can't go wrong with a pair of Veja sneakers. The brand's signature clean aesthetic is accented with a bold and colorful "V," and they look equally chic with jeans and leggings. You can grab them in two different colors, but we love the fresh pop of lavender.nordstrom.comBest Low-Heeled SandalsJeffrey Campbell Head West Mule ($80, originally $160) For easy, low heels that will instantly dress up everything from linen shorts to jeans, these suede mules from Jeffrey Campbell are a hot commodity. They come in three colors that range from creamy neutrals to a pretty blue.nordstrom.comBest DressFarm Rio Delicate Flowers Cotton Minidress ($130, originally $200) Boldly colorful with a mesmerizing print and eye-catching details, this cotton minidress is pure fun. Pack it for your next warm weather vacation or just throw it on to feel like you're out of office. At 35 percent off, it's a deal either way.nordstrom.comBest Leather Tote BagMadewell Handwoven Leather Tote ($198) It's hard to believe that this handwoven leather tote is less than $200, considering you can easily haul a laptop and any other on-the-go items for work commutes or traveling. The interior zipper pocket helps to keep smaller valuables like keys and cash organized and accessible. You can choose between five colors.- — Additional reporting by Angela Elias and Balim TezelKyley Warren (she/her) is an award-winning writer and editor with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She previously worked as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. Before joining PS, Kyley worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.Angela Elias (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping, where she reviews everything from beauty products to kitchen gadgets, curates can't-miss sales, and creates "best of" shopping roundups. In her former roles at PS, she led the relaunch of its Latine identity and family-focused verticals, directed its Home vertical, and hosted shopping segments. She has nearly 15 years of experience working in the lifestyle space as a writer, editor, content strategist, director, on-camera talent, and publicist.Balim Tezel (she/her) is a shopping updates editor at PS and the founder of Maison des Nus, a New York-based affordable luxury brand. She graduated from Northwestern University's Medill School of Journalism.
html:
While each product featured is independently selected by our editors, we may include paid promotion. If you buy something through our links, we may earn commission. Read more about our Product Review Guidelines here.

As shopping editors, we know all the best secrets for navigating Nordstrom's site to find standout styles (and even better deals). It's our job to uncover top-rated products, and Nordstrom certainly doesn't disappoint. Right now is a great time to score some of the brand's most popular pieces at prices you'll love — especially the ones on sale.

If you find yourself in the market to update your closet with a new clothing item or even a top-rated pair of shoes, we have more than a few suggestions. We've curated products that are not only trending, but included in our own personal favorites as well, with many being highly discounted. Below, we've laid them all out for you — because, after all, what are shopping fairy godmothers for?

Nordstrom recently released tons of new products under $50 to the sale section that are sure to sell out quickly, plus a few cult-favorite pieces that are hard enough to find in stock. From a top-rated swimsuit to stylish jeans and editor-loved sunglasses, these pieces are designed to live in your closet for the longterm — even as they endure multiple trend changes and TikTok aesthetics.

Check out the best Nordstrom clothes and accessories that customers are currently loving from the retailer ahead, and buy them before they're gone.

Best Sunglasses

Aire Whirlpool 57mm Aviator Sunglasses ($12, originally $40)

If you've been searching for the perfect pair of vintage-inspired aviator sunglasses, the search is over — at least according to our editor, that is. She tested out this tortoiseshell pair and rated it five stars for its shape, soft lens tint, and subtle pattern. Read more about why she loves these sunglasses in this Aire Whirlpool 53mm Aviator Sunglasses review.

Editor Quote: "I've tried on pairs of aviator sunglasses under $20 that definitely looked their price — I blame the high-gloss shine of the plastic, the thin frames, and the all-wrong lens shapes — but these look much more expensive than they are. When people compliment them, I'm almost giddy to share the price. At less than $40, I honestly consider them a steal." — Angela Elias, contributing editor, Shopping

Best Denim Cutoff Shorts

BP. '90s High Waist Cutoff Denim Shorts ($30, originally $50)

Every summer capsule wardrobe needs a solid pair of raw-hem denim shorts, and this vintage-inspired option from BP. is the gold standard. Made from premium, non-stretch denim with a high waist and relaxed fit, it's a classic piece you'll reach for all season.

Best Workout Leggings

Zella Live In High Waist Leggings ($33, originally $59)

Ready to jump back on the fitness bandwagon? You'll feel even more empowered to kickstart your athletic goals with the help of a great pair of leggings — just like these best-selling Zella leggings from Nordstrom. The high, slip-proof waistband includes a pocket. Whether you're going for a run or just running errands, these leggings will ensure you do it comfortably.

Best Tie-Front Top

WAYF Tabitha Tie Front Woven Shirt ($39, originally $55)

This tie-front top couldn't be more on trend or perfect for a hot summer day. Made from breezy cotton with just a hint of elastane, it's equally comfortable and cute. Pair it with linen shorts or mix and match with your favorite pair of denim.

Best Linen Pants

Caslon Tapered Linen Pants ($42, originally $60)

If you've been on the hunt for a pair of linen pants, you'll want to snag these immediately. Currently 30 percent off, they're a popular option that has the cutest tapered hem and an easy drawstring waist for extra comfort.

Best Deal on a Wire-Free Bra

Wacoal Comfort First Wire Free T-Shirt Bra ($46, originally $68)

Not only is this bra's wire-free construction incredibly comfortable, but it also looks fantastic under a T-shirt. It has brushed fabric that feels soft on the skin and foam-lined cups that help to shape and smooth. We love the pretty eggshell blue color, too.

Best Open-Knit Tank Top

Sanctuary Open Stitch Sleeveless Cotton Sweater ($50, originally $69)

For an elevated tank top that you can dress up or down, this open-weave, sleeveless sweater is a perfect fit. Throw it over a nude cami and pair it with everything from trousers and skirts to jeans and shorts. It also comes in a vibrant shade of green if you're craving more color.

Best Tank Dress

Stretch Cotton Ribbed Tank Dress ($56, originally $80)

Comfortable and casual, this ribbed tank dress is being offered for an unbeatable price and ideal for days when you want to look polished without trying too hard. Slip into a pair of sandals and sling on a tote bag for a classic summer look.

Best Bathing Suit

Beach Riot Reese Rib One-Piece Swimsuit ($67, originally $148)

This Beach Riot one-piece swimsuit is giving '90s Baywatch in the best way with its minimal yet undeniably flattering cut and bold shade. If black isn't your color, it comes in five other hues. With a 4.2 rating, it's a solidly popular choice.

Best Deal on Wide-Leg Jeans

Levi's Baggy High Waist Wide Leg Dad Jeans ($70, originally $108)

These wide-leg jeans are exactly what your wardrobe calls for. Made from premium non-stretch denim, they're as comfortable as sweats but offer much more polish. Pair them with everything from sneakers to flats.

Best Sneakers

Veja Impala Sneaker ($75, originally $150)

If you're looking for a chic, sporty look, you can't go wrong with a pair of Veja sneakers. The brand's signature clean aesthetic is accented with a bold and colorful "V," and they look equally chic with jeans and leggings. You can grab them in two different colors, but we love the fresh pop of lavender.

Best Low-Heeled Sandals

Jeffrey Campbell Head West Mule ($80, originally $160)

For easy, low heels that will instantly dress up everything from linen shorts to jeans, these suede mules from Jeffrey Campbell are a hot commodity. They come in three colors that range from creamy neutrals to a pretty blue.

Best Dress

Farm Rio Delicate Flowers Cotton Minidress ($130, originally $200)

Boldly colorful with a mesmerizing print and eye-catching details, this cotton minidress is pure fun. Pack it for your next warm weather vacation or just throw it on to feel like you're out of office. At 35 percent off, it's a deal either way.

Best Leather Tote Bag

Madewell Handwoven Leather Tote ($198)

It's hard to believe that this handwoven leather tote is less than $200, considering you can easily haul a laptop and any other on-the-go items for work commutes or traveling. The interior zipper pocket helps to keep smaller valuables like keys and cash organized and accessible. You can choose between five colors.

— Additional reporting by Angela Elias and Balim Tezel

Kyley Warren (she/her) is an award-winning writer and editor with more than four years of experience in the publishing space. She previously worked as an assistant editor on PS Shopping and is an expert on all things related to shopping and fashion. Before joining PS, Kyley worked with Entertainment Tonight as a style commerce writer, and her byline has appeared in publications globally.

Angela Elias (she/her) is a contributing editor for PS Shopping, where she reviews everything from beauty products to kitchen gadgets, curates can't-miss sales, and creates "best of" shopping roundups. In her former roles at PS, she led the relaunch of its Latine identity and family-focused verticals, directed its Home vertical, and hosted shopping segments. She has nearly 15 years of experience working in the lifestyle space as a writer, editor, content strategist, director, on-camera talent, and publicist.

Balim Tezel (she/her) is a shopping updates editor at PS and the founder of Maison des Nus, a New York-based affordable luxury brand. She graduated from Northwestern University's Medill School of Journalism.
